mapper.select: select count(*) from ENT_ENTBASIC t where 1=1
select EntEntbasic.* from ENT_ENTBASIC EntEntbasic where EntEntbasic.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update ENT_ENTBASIC set LICENSEATTACH=#{licenseattach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESSPERMISSION=#{businesspermission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLPERMISSIONURL=#{sellpermissionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP1=#{temp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCEPERMISSIONURL=#{producepermissionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCEPERMISSION=#{producepermission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLPERMISSION=#{sellpermission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK=#{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP3=#{temp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTNAME=#{entname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT=#{acct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITTYPE=#{audittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP4=#{temp4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESSPERMISSIONURL=#{businesspermissionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORTPERMISSIONURL=#{importpermissionurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMP2=#{temp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTPHONE=#{contactphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON=#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDATETIME=#{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, CONTACTS=#{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORTPERMISSION=#{importpermission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL=#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLDINFOID=#{oldinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR=#{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTTYPE=#{enttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITCODE=#{creditcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from ENT_ENTBASIC where ID in #{ids}

delete from ENT_ENTBASIC where and LICENSEATTACH = #{licenseattach}and BUSINESSPERMISSION = #{businesspermission}and CREATOR = #{creator}and SELLPERMISSIONURL = #{sellpermissionurl}and TEMP1 = #{temp1}and PRODUCEPERMISSIONURL = #{producepermissionurl}and PRODUCEPERMISSION = #{producepermission}and SELLPERMISSION = #{sellpermission}and BANK = #{bank}and STATUS = #{status}and TEMP3 = #{temp3}and ENTNAME = #{entname}and ACCT = #{acct}and AUDITTYPE = #{audittype}and TEMP4 = #{temp4}and BUSINESSPERMISSIONURL = #{businesspermissionurl}and EMAIL = #{email}and IMPORTPERMISSIONURL = #{importpermissionurl}and TEMP2 = #{temp2}and CONTACTPHONE = #{contactphone}and REASON = #{reason}and LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime}and CONTACTS = #{contacts}and IMPORTPERMISSION = #{importpermission}and TEL = #{tel}and OLDINFOID = #{oldinfoid}and AUDITOR = #{auditor}and ENTTYPE = #{enttype}and CREDITCODE = #{creditcode}and ADDRESS = #{address}
mapper.select: select EntEntbasic.* from ENT_ENTBASIC EntEntbasic where 1=1 and ID=#{id} and LICENSEATTACH = #{licenseattach} and BUSINESSPERMISSION = #{businesspermission} and CREATOR = #{creator} and SELLPERMISSIONURL = #{sellpermissionurl} and TEMP1 = #{temp1} and PRODUCEPERMISSIONURL = #{producepermissionurl} and PRODUCEPERMISSION = #{producepermission} and SELLPERMISSION = #{sellpermission} and BANK = #{bank} and STATUS = #{status} and TEMP3 = #{temp3} and ENTNAME = #{entname} and ACCT = #{acct} and AUDITTYPE = #{audittype} and TEMP4 = #{temp4} and BUSINESSPERMISSIONURL = #{businesspermissionurl} and EMAIL = #{email} and IMPORTPERMISSIONURL = #{importpermissionurl} and TEMP2 = #{temp2} and CONTACTPHONE = #{contactphone} and REASON = #{reason} and LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime} and CONTACTS = #{contacts} and IMPORTPERMISSION = #{importpermission} and TEL = #{tel} and OLDINFOID = #{oldinfoid} and AUDITOR = #{auditor} and ENTTYPE = #{enttype} and CREDITCODE = #{creditcode} and ADDRESS = #{address}

select EntEntbasic.* from ENT_ENTBASIC EntEntbasic where 1=1 and ID=#{id} and LICENSEATTACH = #{param.licenseattach} and BUSINESSPERMISSION = #{param.businesspermission} and CREATOR = #{param.creator} and SELLPERMISSIONURL = #{param.sellpermissionurl} and TEMP1 = #{param.temp1} and PRODUCEPERMISSIONURL = #{param.producepermissionurl} and PRODUCEPERMISSION = #{param.producepermission} and SELLPERMISSION = #{param.sellpermission} and BANK = #{param.bank} and STATUS = #{param.status} and TEMP3 = #{param.temp3} and ENTNAME = #{param.entname} and ACCT = #{param.acct} and AUDITTYPE = #{param.audittype} and TEMP4 = #{param.temp4} and BUSINESSPERMISSIONURL = #{param.businesspermissionurl} and EMAIL = #{param.email} and IMPORTPERMISSIONURL = #{param.importpermissionurl} and TEMP2 = #{param.temp2} and CONTACTPHONE = #{param.contactphone} and REASON = #{param.reason} and LASTUPDATETIME = #{param.lastupdatetime} and CONTACTS = #{param.contacts} and IMPORTPERMISSION = #{param.importpermission} and TEL = #{param.tel} and OLDINFOID = #{param.oldinfoid} and AUDITOR = #{param.auditor} and ENTTYPE = #{param.enttype} and CREDITCODE = #{param.creditcode} and ADDRESS = #{param.address}

select EntEntbasic.* from ENT_ENTBASIC EntEntbasic where 1=1 and LICENSEATTACH like #{param.licenseattach} and BUSINESSPERMISSION like #{param.businesspermission} and CREATOR like #{param.creator} and SELLPERMISSIONURL like #{param.sellpermissionurl} and TEMP1 like #{param.temp1} and PRODUCEPERMISSIONURL like #{param.producepermissionurl} and PRODUCEPERMISSION like #{param.producepermission} and SELLPERMISSION like #{param.sellpermission} and BANK like #{param.bank} and STATUS like #{param.status} and TEMP3 like #{param.temp3} and ENTNAME like #{param.entname} and ACCT like #{param.acct} and AUDITTYPE like #{param.audittype} and TEMP4 like #{param.temp4} and BUSINESSPERMISSIONURL like #{param.businesspermissionurl} and EMAIL like #{param.email} and IMPORTPERMISSIONURL like #{param.importpermissionurl} and TEMP2 like #{param.temp2} and CONTACTPHONE like #{param.contactphone} and REASON like #{param.reason} and LASTUPDATETIME like #{param.lastupdatetime} and CONTACTS like #{param.contacts} and IMPORTPERMISSION like #{param.importpermission} and TEL like #{param.tel} and OLDINFOID like #{param.oldinfoid} and AUDITOR like #{param.auditor} and ENTTYPE like #{param.enttype} and CREDITCODE like #{param.creditcode} and ADDRESS like #{param.address}
